name: The name of your mod
gameversion: The latest version of the game your mod works on
loaderversion: The MelonLoader version your mod runs on
modtype: Must be "Mod" or "Plugin" (Practically always a mod)
author: You!
description: Must be less than or equal to 4096 chars
searchtags: An array of strings that will be checked against when a user searches for mods
requirements: An array of (preferably) markdown links ("[viewable text](link url)") that point to the requirements of your mod
sourcelink: The link to your mods source
changelog: What has changed since you last updated?
